DOC.brief_summary: This study design assess safety investigational nasal spray treatment perennial allergic rhinitis . Perennial allergic rhinitis trigger house dust , mite mold etc . Typical symptom sneeze , nasal congestion pruritus rhinorrhea .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Informed consent . Outpatient . Diagnosis perennial allergic rhinitis symptom . Able comply study procedure . Exclusion criterion : Significant concomitant medical condition . Use corticosteroids/allergy medication . Laboratory abnormality . Positive pregnancy test .
